item.title: Software
item.description: NuGet Packages Rollcall (aka Rollcall.Extensions.Microsoft.DependencyInjection) Rollcall provides support for named service registration through the use of extension methods on the IServiceCollection interface, and retrieval of registered service by name using a factory. For more information and benchmarks on the various ways to register multiple implementations of the same interface, see this blog post.
